Basic SELECT.description: A simple select with a single table and predicate

Select with INNER JOIN.description: A select with a single INNER JOIN
Select with INNER JOIN.code:
SELECT *
FROM
	<table1>
	INNER JOIN <table2> ON
		<table1>.<column> = <table2>.<column>
WHERE
	<table2>.<column> = <value>

Select with LEFT JOIN.description: A select with a single LEFT JOIN
Select with LEFT JOIN.code:
SELECT *
FROM
	<table1>
	LEFT JOIN <table2> ON
		<table1>.<column> = <table2>.<column>
WHERE
	<table2>.<column> = <value>

Basic UPDATE.description: A simple UPDATE for a single row in a table

Basic DELETE.description: A simple DELETE for a single row in a table

Basic INSERT.description: A simple INSERT for a single row into a table
